sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: E2fsprogs-&e2fsprogs-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, sync gcc: cc grep: egrep grep: grep gzip: gzip make: make mawk: awk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, expr, uname texinfo: makeinfo textutils: cat, tr
